main event: A witness observed an object with a comet-like trail in the Richmond-Norfolk, Virginia area on July 10, 1960, which moved erratically before climbing to 45,000 feet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds,The object was described as having a trail similar to a comet,The Air Force eventually concluded that the sighting was likely a balloon,The sighting went unconfirmed by nearby radar facilities,This incident is part of the Project Blue Book collection.
sighted object: an object with a comet-like trail
witness description: A witness in the area observed the object.
